abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed IDA Credit would make
            available $5.0 million equivalent to help finance the
            foreign exchange component of priority investments in
            various economic sectors. Such investments have been and
            will be selected in such a way as to utilize existing assets
            more fully. They will further provide a basis for successful
            implementation of measures to increase production and
            exports of cocoa, which are currently under formulation.
